name: Picar
tagline: Control your old RC-car with a Raspberry Pi running PiCar OS.
body:
# PiCar

Welcome to the project page of PiCar! PiCar allows you to control and program your radio-controlled car with a RasPi and some Python. Just fork the repository and try it out! Also follow [@picar_os](https://www.twitter.com/picar_os) on Twitter!

## Features of PiCar 0.01alpha (release on October 19, 2014)

+ Added MoviX engine
+ Added basic motor control
+ Added lighting control
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
